  1. import pycurl
  2. import certifi
  3. import StringIO
  6. class curl_connection(object):
  8. """Helper for curl connections"""
  10. def __init__(self, username, password):
  11. self.username = username
  12. self.password = password
  14. def authenticate(self):
  15. """Authenticate curl connection"""
  16. self.curl = pycurl.Curl()
  17. self.curl.setopt(pycurl.CAINFO, certifi.where())
  18. self.curl.setopt(self.curl.USERPWD, '%s:%s' % (self.username, self.password))
  20. def perform(self, url):
  21. """Perform get request and return respond value"""
  22. b = StringIO.StringIO()
  23. self.curl.setopt(self.curl.URL, str(url))
  24. self.curl.setopt(self.curl.WRITEFUNCTION, b.write)
  25. self.curl.perform()
  26. return b.getvalue()
  28. def perform_post(self, url, post):
  29. """Perform post request"""
  30. self.curl.setopt(self.curl.URL, str(url))
  31. self.curl.setopt(self.curl.POST, 1)
  32. self.curl.setopt(self.curl.POSTFIELDS, post)
  33. self.curl.perform()
  35. def get_http_code(self):
  36. """Return curl HTTP Code"""
  37. return self.curl.getinfo(pycurl.HTTP_CODE)
  39. def close(self):
  40. """Close curl connection"""
  41. self.curl.close()
